item.title: OLPC Chicago Jabber Server
item.description: Today I spent a minute setting up a Ejabberd Server for the OLPC Chicago group. This will allow all of us OLPC XO hackers to be on the same “mesh.” To get started using the jabber server with your XO follow these simple steps: Boot the XO Get connected to the internet Open a terminal (activity or ctrl-alt-f1) in the shell, type: su - then type: sugar-control-panel -s jabber jabber.
